attributes.action: Ban Live Sporting Moving Electronic Adverts
attributes.additional_details:
These Live Sporting Moving Electronic Adverts are spoiling more and more Televised Live Sporting Events.
You settle down to watch an exciting football match or Motogp race and your concentration is constantly being affected by the Moving Electronic Images flashing in your peripheral vision. It is almost like a disease gradually spoiling more and more televised events. The government should act to prevent this happening to our national sports.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the governing body of the sport concerned.
